subHeading: Comprehensive preparation guide for Tamil Nadu State Board Class 12 students across Science, Commerce, and Arts streams.
quickIntro: The Tamil Nadu Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) Examination is conducted at the end of Class 12 by the Directorate of Government Examinations (DGE), Tamil Nadu. It is a crucial board examination for higher education admissions.
examConductingBody: Directorate of Government Examinations (DGE), Tamil Nadu

assessmentPattern.theory: Written board examination conducted at the end of the academic year
assessmentPattern.practical: Practical examinations for applicable subjects such as Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Computer Science
assessmentPattern.internalAssessment: Internal marks based on practicals, assignments, and periodic assessments

gradingSystem.resultFormat: Subject-wise marks and overall pass/fail status

eligibility.academicRequirement: Must have passed Tamil Nadu State Board Class 11 or equivalent
eligibility.schoolRequirement: Must be enrolled in a recognized higher secondary school
